column17: The incident occurred in the Garachukhur neighborhood
column18: 11/26/2014: Assailants set fire to a mosque in Garachukhur neighborhood, Baku city, Azerbaijan. A guard was injured in the attack. No group claimed responsibility for the incident; however, security forces attributed the attack to Yekbun.
column108: A mosque was damaged in this attack.
column126: \\"\"Azerbaijan detains two suspects over arson attack on mosque in Baku"

column18: 12/03/2016: Security forces shot and killed a suicide bomber attempting to detonate near a shopping center in Baku, Azerbaijan. The assailant was the only reported casualty. No group claimed responsibility for the incident; however, authorities identified the assailant as Emin Azizagaoglu Jami.
column97: An explosives-laden belt was used in the attack.
column126: \\"\"Azeri Security Forces Kill Suspected Suicide Bomber"

column17: The incident occurred in the Nagorno-Karabakh region.
column18: 02/25/2017: Assailants attacked soldiers in the disputed Nagorno-Karabakh region in Khojavend district, Azerbaijan. Five Azerbaijani soldiers were killed in the attack. Azerbaijan's Defense Ministry attributed the attack to Armenian separatists; however, a spokesperson for the Armenian fighters claimed that Azeri forces launched the assault and that they were acting in self defense.
column125: There is doubt that this incident meets terrorism-related criteria. Armenian separatists claim the attack was initiated by Azeri government forces.
